name: Add Host
description: Add a hosts file entry in the dev container.

host_name.description: Host name to add to the container's hosts file

host_ip.description: The IP Address to associate with the host name

postStartCommand: date >> /home/vscode/foo && echo "postStart" >> /home/vscode/foo && sudo cp /etc/hosts /etc/hosts_old && cat /etc/hosts_old | sed '/host.docker.internal$/d' > /tmp/hosts && cat /etc/hosts_temp | tee -a /tmp/hosts > /dev/null && sudo cp /tmp/hosts /etc/hosts
